column9: This node is collapsed. Click the triangle at the left to expand it.
Use the buttons at the right to add nodes
You can also drag and drop
Note: the Save button only works with a local file!
Use the buttons at the right to indent/un-indent
Add Node will add a sibling
Add Child will add a child of the current node
Drag the marker at the left
If you drop above another marker, the node is inserted above
Drop in the lower half to insert below
